lsystem.collection

Class StochasticList

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.collection.StochasticList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleList

    public class StochasticList
extends java.lang.Object
implements RuleList
    A storage class for weighted rules holds/implements the weighted selection logic (now as inner class since version 0.74 [24 November 2011-14])
    Author:
    Martin Prout
